name: Htown Fight Minnies
description:
The video game of the South. Featuring all your favorite HTown rap artist. Lil Flip, Lil KeKe, Big Pokey, Cl Che', Fiya, C-Note "Botany Boyz", DRed, Will Lean, Icey Hot, Lil Flea, Devin Dude, Slim Thug, Paul Wall, ZRO, Billy Cook, TonyHitmann, Iron Mike, Gt Garza, South Park Mexican, Geto Boyz, Lil Kano, Jhiame, J Dawg, Solo D, Lil Mario,Sauce Walka, OTB Fast Lane, Screwed Up Click (S.U.C.), Wreckshop Records, Boss Hogg Outlaws, Swisha House, Upside Productions, Dope House Records ...and many , many more.

• The ultimate Fighting Game experience.

• Level up and get your hands on more of your favorite characters unlock epic items and gear for your player.

• Fight hard to gain respect from your peers.

• Choose game mode and see how tough you really are. Beat the street soldiers to get to the bosses.
